Docs.summary: Provides extension methods for working with content associated with OpenAI.Responses.

static member Add : System.Collections.Generic.IList<Microsoft.Extensions.AI.AITool> * OpenAI.Responses.ResponseTool -> unit

Docs.param: The list of s to which the provided tool should be added.
Docs.summary: Adds the to the list of s.
Docs.remarks: does not derive from , so it cannot be added directly to a list of s. Instead, this method wraps the provided in an and adds that to the list. The returned by will be able to unwrap the when it processes the list of tools and use the provided as-is.

MemberSignature.Value: public static Microsoft.Extensions.AI.AITool AsAITool (this OpenAI.Responses.ResponseTool tool);
.method public static hidebysig class Microsoft.Extensions.AI.AITool AsAITool(class OpenAI.Responses.ResponseTool tool) cil managed
<Extension()> Public Function AsAITool (tool As ResponseTool) As AITool
static member AsAITool : OpenAI.Responses.ResponseTool -> Microsoft.Extensions.AI.AITool

Docs.param: The tool to wrap as an .
Docs.summary: Creates an to represent a raw .

remarks.para: The returned tool is only suitable for use with the returned by (or s that delegate to such an instance). It is likely to be ignored by any other implementation.

When a tool has a corresponding -derived type already defined in Microsoft.Extensions.AI, such as , , , or , those types should be preferred instead of this method, as they are more portable, capable of being respected by any implementation. This method does not attempt to map the supplied to any of those types, it simply wraps it as-is: the returned by will be able to unwrap the when it processes the list of tools.
